title: Shadows of the Azure Spire
description: Unmask the cabal inside the Azure Spire by choosing an infiltration route, surviving the twists, and confronting the mastermind in the mirror heart.

encounters.title: Summons from the Silverwind
encounters.description: Three days before you reach the Azure Spire, a silver courier hawk finds your caravan with a note sealed by Spymaster Kaela. It speaks of a mirror-born conspiracy and begs you to detour to the war camp before the council meeting.

options.text: Read Kaela’s sealed letter aloud.
options.outcome: Kaela’s script explains that someone is forging scrying reports in the spire’s name. She needs a neutral champion—someone unaligned with the four banners—to expose the lie.

options.text: Ask your traveling companions if the detour is worth it.
options.outcome: Merchants fear losing their cargo slots, soldiers worry about being branded mercenaries, and a young scholar begs you to help Kaela because her mentor vanished after speaking against the mirrors.

options.text: Agree to detour to Kaela’s war camp.
options.outcome: You steer toward the camp at dusk, ready to hear what could topple an empire.

encounters.title: Kaela’s Briefing
encounters.description: Kaela pins a sketch of the Azure Spire to a table and traces three colored routes. She wants you to decide how to proceed while her scouts stall the banners from tearing each other apart.

options.text: Press for detailed maps and ward glyphs.
options.successOutcome: Kaela slides you a ward-key cipher that will soften one barrier on whichever route you choose.
options.failureOutcome: You only get half-finished glyphs, but you memorize the patrol cadence.

options.text: Ask Kaela to prioritize sheltering the refugee banners.
options.outcome: She agrees and sends her two scouts to escort the refugees, reducing the risk of an open riot while you infiltrate.

options.text: Request counterfeit envoy seals to pose as inspectors.
options.outcome: Kaela gives you forged seals that will make soldiers hesitate before attacking—if you can flash them in time.

encounters.title: Nightfall at the War Camp
encounters.description: You arrive at a wind-torn war camp outside the Azure Spire. Lanterns flicker across tents bearing four rival banners. Before you can announce yourself, a half-elf with ink-stained gloves approaches, flanked by two silent scouts.

tutorial.title: Meeting the Spymaster
tutorial.content: Before the mission begins, meet the handler who holds the threads. Use these options to learn names, stakes, and why you’ve been summoned.

options.text: Let the stranger speak.
options.outcome: She introduces herself as Kaela of the Mirror Archives—now Spymaster to the battered banners. She repeats the courier passphrase from her letter, “Broken Prism, Unbroken Oath,” to prove she authored it, and explains that only an outsider can strike the Azure Spire without sparking war.

options.text: Confirm she authored the summons.
options.outcome: Kaela rubs sleep-starved eyes and explains that Vael was once the loudest voice for unity. Years of stalemate let Ryell whisper in their ear, promising the mirrors could force peace by faking hostile acts. The plan spiraled, and now the mirrors rewrite testimony faster than envoys can react.

options.text: "What exactly is the mirror heart?"
options.outcome: She points to the spinning glyphs at the center of her map. The mirror heart is a nexus that routes every scrying pool and diplomatic record through Ryell’s focus. If it locks, every truth in the empire will be filtered through Vael’s lies.

options.text: "And who are you in all this, Kaela?"
options.outcome: Kaela was the spire’s archivist before the war, now elevated to spymaster after exposing a dozen double agents. She is one of the few people every banner trusts to hold their secrets—even as those same banners watch her for the slightest misstep.

options.text: Review council dossiers and mark suspicious names.
options.successOutcome: You spot forged signatures tying Vael's personal seal to Ryell’s mirror wards, plus ledgers showing shipments bound for foreign warfronts.
options.failureOutcome: You misfile key notes but still glean the names of diplomats who suddenly vanished into the mirror network.

options.text: Send a stealth scouting party toward the spire.
options.successOutcome: They return with silhouettes of hidden entrances and a glimpse of mirrored messengers rehearsing Vael’s voice.
options.failureOutcome: Wards singe your scouts, putting the garrison on edge and proving Ryell’s defenses are already adapting.

encounters.title: Echoes Around the War Camp
encounters.description: Word of Vael’s treachery spreads faster than Kaela can contain. Refugee banners huddle in silence, soldiers sharpen blades meant for allies, and mirrored messengers float above the tents listening for dissent. Before the council convenes, you can ground your team by hearing the people you’re trying to save.

options.text: Check in with Kaela before the council begins.
options.outcome: Kaela confides that if any banner leaks this plan, the others will declare her a traitor. She needs you to gather leverage that even Vael cannot refute.

options.text: Sit with the refugees displaced by the mirror forges.
options.outcome: They describe how their villages vanished from scrying pools overnight and beg you to make the truth undeniable. Their pleas steel your resolve as you head to the command tent.

options.text: Confront a hawkish envoy who suspects Kaela of staging a coup.
options.successOutcome: You calm the envoy with glimpses of the forged ledgers, winning cautious support for whichever route you choose.
options.failureOutcome: The envoy storms off to rally their banner, raising the stakes for failure inside the spire.

options.text: Intercept a mirrored messenger drifting toward Vael.
options.successOutcome: You snare the mirror sprite and glean that Ryell is querying every ward for your whereabouts. Armed with this intel, you enter the council tent.
options.failureOutcome: The sprite slips free, projecting your face above the camp and forcing Kaela to rush the council meeting.

options.text: Cool tempers between two rival banners before the meeting.
options.successOutcome: You broker a shaky truce that buys you time to push whichever plan you choose.
options.failureOutcome: Your mediation stalls, but you learn which envoy is closest to walking out.

encounters.title: Council of Unlikely Allies
encounters.description: Envoys from every banner demand to know which infiltration plan you’ll lead. Kaela needs proof before accusing Vael, but if you hesitate the envoys will declare the strike a coup. Each route offers leverage to expose the mirror cabal without igniting war.

options.text: Ask the envoys why each route matters.
options.outcome: The griffon-rider from the rookery warns that the pylons echo Vael’s decrees. The tunnel saboteur explains the forges were built with every banner’s gold. The masquerade herald whispers that nobles brag about erased towns between dances. All three ask you to repeat the "Broken Prism" passphrase so they know Kaela truly empowered you.

options.text: Lead the skybridge assault from the rookery.
options.outcome: Winged mounts are readied for a perilous glide toward the warded aerie where Vael stores the mirror pylons that rewrite testimony.

options.text: Slip through the steam tunnels beneath the spire.
options.outcome: Saboteurs hand you maps of pipes, sluices, and forgotten catwalks that feed the mirror forges supplying Vael’s double agents.

options.text: Attend the mirror masquerade as honored guests.
options.outcome: Tailors, heralds, and smugglers outfit you for a night of intrigue where the nobles who bankroll Vael’s plot brag about their sealed ledgers.

encounters.title: Skybridge Glide
encounters.description: Wind howls across the crystal spans guarded by Vael’s sentry-rooks. One misstep sends you into the abyss and leaves Ryell free to finish the mirror nexus.

options.text: Pause to study the wardlights and mirrored runes.
options.outcome: You watch reflections ripple between pylons, each rune echoing council decrees in Vael’s own handwriting. Ryell bound the law itself to these bridges.

options.text: Launch grappling hooks and sprint across the slick span.
options.successOutcome: You anchor the line and lead the squad across, spotting pylons inscribed with Vael’s courtroom decrees.
options.failureOutcome: A hook slips, alarming the rookery and echoing Ryell’s mirrored chant down the span.

options.text: Elf: Moonstep along the wardlights.
options.outcome: The wardlights recognise your song, masking the assault.

options.text: Ranger: Command the rookery eagles to create a diversion.
options.outcome: Eagles screech through the skybridge, drawing sentries away.

options.text: Halfling: Ride spice crates ferried over pulley lines.
options.outcome: You tuck into a crate and glide into the aerie kitchens unnoticed.

options.text: Monk: Run along the vertical walls to bypass the gaps.
options.outcome: You sprint across the sheer crystal faces, defying gravity.

encounters.title: Sentinel Sweep
encounters.description: Warded sentinels fan out after spotting the failed hook, repeating Vael’s accusations in mirrored chorus. You must silence them fast.

options.text: Cut them down and regain the initiative.
options.outcome: You dispatch the sentinels and race deeper into the aerie.

encounters.title: Warded Aerie
encounters.description: Crystal pylons pulse above the council chamber, waiting to recast Vael’s lies as law. Disable them or let them misfire later.

options.text: Wizard: Redirect the energy into decoy mirrors.
options.outcome: The pylons now answer to your gestures, granting an edge in the final chamber.

options.text: Fighter: Hammer in anchors to create cover for allies.
options.outcome: Bolstered platforms will shield you during the confrontation.

options.text: Cleric: Appease the storm spirits bound to the pylons.
options.outcome: The spirits agree to warn you if the cabal tries to flee.

options.text: Plant alchemical charges to collapse the aerie later.
options.successOutcome: Charges are primed to blow on your signal.
options.failureOutcome: A charge sputters loudly, alerting additional guards.

encounters.title: Aerie Wardens
encounters.description: The sputtered charge draws the attention of the elite Sky Wardens. They swoop down from the rafters, lances crackling with lightning.

options.text: Ground the wardens.
options.outcome: You clip their wings and clear the platform, hastily finishing the sabotage before the final confrontation.

encounters.title: Underworks Crawl
encounters.description: Steam pipes hiss and glow beneath the spire. Smuggled mirror crates roll through here toward allied warfronts, and one valve wrong floods the tunnels with scalding brine.

options.text: Listen to the pipes for whispered orders.
options.outcome: Steam carries the voices of foremen reading Vael’s requisitions aloud. Every blast of heat reminds you that the cabal is arming armies who think they’re receiving aid.

options.text: Navigate using heat-scarred maps.
options.successOutcome: You weave through dry sluices toward the forge and overhear engineers praising Vael for keeping the armies well fed.
options.failureOutcome: A valve bursts, forcing you to reroute through hostile patrols who brag about Ryell’s new mirror supply lines.

options.text: Dwarf: Recite the mason’s passphrase etched into the support stones.
options.outcome: Maintenance doors unlock silently at your words.

options.text: Rogue: Shadow the smugglers who use these tunnels.
options.outcome: You tail smugglers carrying mirror shards and learn their drop sites.

encounters.title: Boiling Interception
encounters.description: A burst pipe showers steam while wardens close in, clutching requisition orders bearing Vael’s seal.

options.text: Force a vent to flood the hallway and escape.
options.successOutcome: The wardens shove through scalding water while you slip away with their stamped orders.
options.failureOutcome: The valve jams; you’ll have to fight through the heat as their shouts echo Vael’s edicts.

encounters.title: Steam Tunnel Ambush
encounters.description: The burst valve was a trap. Steam-warped constructs lurch from the walls, blocking your path to the forge.

options.text: Smash the constructs and clear the path.
options.outcome: You shatter the steam-powered cores and press on to the forge.

encounters.title: Ember Forge
encounters.description: Deep beneath the spire, mirror crystals are tempered in lava wells before being shipped to foreign generals. Sabotage here can topple the cabal’s supply lines and prove Vael’s collusion.

options.text: Dragonborn: Unleash a challenge roar to scatter the forge crew.
options.outcome: Workers flee, leaving you free to sabotage the wells.

options.text: Barbarian: Smash the cooling vents with brute force.
options.outcome: You shatter the vents, causing the lava to cool and harden instantly.

options.text: Criminal: Bribe smugglers to divert the mirror shipments.
options.outcome: They promise to mislabel cargo, starving the cabal of supplies.

options.text: Etch destabilizing runes into the crystal molds.
options.successOutcome: The molds will fracture at your signal.
options.failureOutcome: A rune flares, summoning a molten guardian.

encounters.title: Molten Guardian
encounters.description: The rune you etched flares with unstable magic, pulling magma from the wells to form a hulking sentinel. It blocks the exit, radiating heat that warps the air.

options.text: Cool the guardian's fury.
options.outcome: The magma cools into harmless slag as the guardian crumbles. You quickly etch the last rune, ensuring the sabotage is set.

encounters.title: Mirror Masquerade
encounters.description: Laughter echoes through mirrored halls while masked nobles toast Vael for keeping their trade routes open and quietly reference Ryell’s mirror ledger.

options.text: Mingle with nobles to hear the latest mirror gossip.
options.outcome: Patrons brag about how Vael’s mirrors replaced inconvenient envoys and how Ryell can spin two contradictory proclamations at once.

options.text: Glide through the dance, eavesdropping on whispers.
options.successOutcome: You overhear the passphrase for the vault lifts along with gossip that Vael erased an entire envoy with mirror doubles.
options.failureOutcome: A partner notices your distraction and questions you loudly about Kaela’s accusations.

options.text: Noble: Brandish your pedigree to command the heralds.
options.outcome: Heralds usher you to the private gallery overlooking the vaults.

options.text: Bard: Perform a mesmerizing ballad to distract the room.
options.outcome: The guests are so captivated they don't notice your team slipping away.

options.text: Acolyte: Bless the charity auction to win clergy support.
options.outcome: Priests reveal a hidden service elevator.

options.text: Sage: Decode the mirrored toasts.
options.outcome: Each toast maps to a lever combination for the vault floor.

encounters.title: Spotlight Interrogation
encounters.description: A masked inquisitor drags you beneath a spotlight, accusing Kaela of treason in Vael’s name. Talk or trick your way out before they summon guards.

options.text: Spin a convincing cover story.
options.successOutcome: The inquisitor applauds your wit and lets you go, muttering that Vael will not appreciate loose tongues.
options.failureOutcome: They snap their fingers for enforcers who promise to inform Ryell.

options.text: Folk Hero: Rally the servants with a defiant toast.
options.outcome: Servants cheer, creating enough distraction for you to slip away.

encounters.title: Ballroom Brawl
encounters.description: The inquisitor’s snap summons masked guards. You must silence them before they alert the entire gala.

options.text: Defeat the guards quietly.
options.outcome: You knock out the guards and hide the bodies before entering the vault.

encounters.title: Gilded Vault
encounters.description: You stand above the mirror vault, watching the cabal shunt incriminating evidence through portals and counting crates stamped with Vael’s seal.

options.text: Human: Cite the empire’s ledger laws to seize the vault.
options.outcome: Clerks freeze, convinced an audit has arrived.

options.text: Suspend the vault in stasis to preserve proof.
options.successOutcome: Evidence hangs in midair, ready to be weaponized in council.
options.failureOutcome: The stasis flickers, alerting the vault guardians.

options.text: Dragonborn: Challenge the chief steward to ritual combat over the vault keys.
options.outcome: The steward yields the keys rather than lose face.

encounters.title: Vault Guardians
encounters.description: The stasis spell shatters, triggering silent alarms. Armored constructs step from the alcoves, their halberds leveled at intruders.

options.text: Dismantle the constructs.
options.outcome: You dismantle the constructs and secure the vault evidence before reinforcements arrive.

encounters.title: Mirror Heart Confrontation
encounters.description: Councilor Vael and the unseen Archon Ryell appear amid towering mirrors while Kaela listens through a scrying focus. The intel you gathered sets the tone—show proof, trigger sabotage, or watch the council fall for Vael’s propaganda.

options.text: Demand to know why Vael risked civil war.
options.outcome: Vael claims that unity through fear is better than endless skirmishes. They insist Ryell’s mirrors merely show people the endings they deserve.

options.text: Ask Ryell what they gain from the mirror nexus.
options.outcome: Ryell admits the nexus lets them catalog every possible future. They hint that someone worse than Vael asked for the data, and only a new pact will keep the knowledge safe.

options.text: Challenge Vael publicly and demand their confession.
options.outcome: Vael’s illusions ripple as you cite the betrayals you witnessed.

options.text: Hear Ryell’s plea and propose an alliance against darker threats.
options.outcome: The Archon offers mirror schematics and turns on Vael to secure their own survival.

options.text: Detonate the aerie pylons to shatter Vael’s mirrors.
options.outcome: Explosions rain shards, forcing the conspirators to their knees.

options.text: Ignite the sabotaged forge and threaten to collapse the spire’s supply lines.
options.outcome: Cracks spread through the floor as Ryell begs for terms.

options.text: Broadcast the vault evidence to the masquerade guests.
options.outcome: Screens across the ballroom display Ryell’s orders, turning the crowd against them.

options.text: Sage: Decode the mirror nexus live, naming every conspirator.
options.outcome: Holographic sigils point to every traitor still hiding in the city.

options.text: Folk Hero: Call to the crowds outside to storm the courtyard.
options.outcome: Chants thunder through the hall, cowing the council into surrender.

options.text: Strike Vael down before they can speak.
options.outcome: Vael retreats behind a wall of glass, summoning a construct to crush you.

encounters.title: The Mirror Guardian
encounters.description: A towering construct of glass and steel steps from the mirror, its reflection showing your own death.

options.text: Shatter the guardian.
options.outcome: The construct explodes into harmless dust. Vael stands defenseless.

encounters.title: Council Reckoning
encounters.description: With Vael’s treachery laid bare, envoys from every banner flood the mirror heart. Chaos threatens to erupt, but the Silverwind passphrase cuts through the noise. All eyes turn to you and Kaela to seal the council’s fate.

options.text: Let Kaela present the case to the envoys.
options.outcome: Kaela recites the courier code and unfurls the ledgers, ensuring each banner signs the confession transcript.

options.text: Address the banners yourself and display the proof.
options.successOutcome: Envoys pledge to honor the Broken Prism accord and await your recommendation.
options.failureOutcome: Some envoys still glare, but Kaela steps in to keep them seated.

options.text: Hand Vael to the banners for judgment.
options.outcome: You yield Vael to the banners, who argue fiercely over punishment. The decision will shape the new peace.

options.text: Offer Ryell a covert pact to monitor the mirrors.
options.outcome: Whispers ripple as you imply Ryell can stay—if they feed Kaela secrets forever.

encounters.title: Banner Tribunal
encounters.description: Envoys crowd around the bound Vael, arguing whether to exile or execute. Each choice will anger someone—and earn another’s loyalty.

options.text: Exile Vael beyond the empire’s borders.
options.outcome: The banners agree to banish Vael, binding them with a geas to never return. Some grumble that exile is too kind, others breathe easier at avoiding martyrdom.

options.text: Call for execution to appease the angriest banners.
options.outcome: Vael’s sentence is swift. The banners sign off, but Kaela warns that killing them may inspire sympathizers to go underground.

encounters.title: Shadow Accord
encounters.description: Ryell lingers in the reflections, waiting to hear whether they become ally, prisoner, or fugitive.

options.text: Bind Ryell with the Silverwind oath to watch for future plots.
options.outcome: Ryell swears to Kaela’s terms, agreeing to turn the mirror nexus into a warning system. The banners reluctantly sign an addendum to the accord.

options.text: Let Ryell slip away to the mirror realm in exchange for secrets.
options.outcome: Ryell vanishes with a promise of future intelligence, leaving you with a clandestine advantage and a lingering risk.

encounters.title: Aftermath in the War Camp
encounters.description: The confrontation is over. Vael has been taken into custody, and the mirror cabal is broken. Back at the war camp, the envoys look to you and Kaela to finalize the official record of these events. The choices you made will shape the peace that follows.

options.text: Deliver the full truth and prepare the council for upheaval.
options.outcome: You remind Kaela of the promise stamped in her Silverwind letter. Together you present every scrap of proof, and she dispatches envoys to secure the spire while honoring her vow to keep the banners informed. The war is averted, for now.

options.text: Conceal certain secrets to keep leverage for yourself.
options.outcome: Instead of quoting the Silverwind oath, you slip a few mirrored fragments into your pack. Kaela notices but says nothing, assuming the courier code phrase no longer binds you. You leave the camp with a heavy purse and a dangerous secret.
